class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ret = 0
        run_started = False
        k_seen = False
        most_recent_subtotals = dict()
        for i, num in enumerate(nums):
            if k & (num ^ k):
                run_started = False
                k_seen = False
                most_recent_subtotals = dict()
                continue
            if run_started is False:
                run_started = i
            most_recent_subtotals[num] = i    
            new_subtotals_dict = dict()
            for subtotal, index in most_recent_subtotals.items():
                new_subtotal = subtotal & num
                if new_subtotal not in new_subtotals_dict:
                    new_subtotals_dict[new_subtotal] = index
                    continue
                new_subtotals_dict[new_subtotal] = max(index, new_subtotals_dict[new_subtotal])
            most_recent_subtotals = new_subtotals_dict
            if k not in most_recent_subtotals:
                continue
            ret += most_recent_subtotals[k] - run_started + 1
        return ret
        
        # 6
